file_content.text: You have your reward, spacer. Stop bothering me!
My gundark! What have you done, stupid spacer?
Weren't you entertained, Drooga?
I kept things lively.
Well, yes... but do not change the subject!
Bowdaar is under my protection.
Saved a friend.
The way I see it, I'm the life of this party. You should be paying me.
Give me Bowdaar.
Tell you what... I'll take the Wookiee off your hands for free.
I should hire you as my new joke teller! I fed the last one to the savrips because he stopped being funny.
You and this Wookiee are boring and expensive to maintain! Get out of my sight--both of you!
Bowdaar is free of the Hutt. You earn Bowdaar's friendship--and service.
I want you to join my crew.
Thanks, big guy.
Where do you plan to bunk him? I'll bet he snores like a busted Podracer engine.
My life is full of trouble, Bowdaar. If you want to tag along, that's your choice.
Are you sure?
There is no choice. You set Bowdaar free.
Yeah, free to make my life miserable. He smells like a wet bantha.
You owe me your life.
Blasted right you do.
That's great. What's he owe me?
Bowdaar defends and honors you, friend. Always.
We do not understand the value you place on this beast, but we will see to it he reaches your starship safely.
We bid you farewell. It has been... stimulating.
Watching you kill Zank Helrott was most entertaining, spacer. I almost forgive all your past rudeness!
Can't you see I'm busy being festive? Talk to my servant Ga'ram!
What have you done, fool? You ruined everything! The Wookiee fights alone, or there's no drama!
What do you mean, "drama"?
Drama?
You spoiled my pre-meal entertainment, you ignorant, half-wit spacer!
I don't believe in unfair fights.
He deserved backup.
Did I ask what you believe? This is my party, idiot! I decide what is fair!
Those Kaleesh ticked me off.
That wasn't for the Wookiee.
This was not your fight! You weren't even invited to my party!
I paid for the best Kaleesh warriors on Nar Shaddaa to face my adorable pet Wookiee.
This colossal battle was to whet the appetite, and I am unsatisfied! What do you have to say for yourself?
Why didn't you try to stop me?
It's not my fault.
I didn't think you'd actually be rude enough to fight on my pleasure barge!
It was all a big misunderstanding. I apologize for intruding.
Sorry for the mess.
I excuse your rudeness, but only because I am a generous and well-loved Hutt.
Life's full of disappointments, roly-poly.
Suck it up.
How dare you insult me! I would feed you to my gundark, but I'm starving it for a special occasion.
A shame the fight ended so quickly. Those Kaleesh were better actors than warriors. I'm glad I don't have to pay them.
And you, spacer, I know why you've come. You waste your time. I don't need your beast anymore!
You made a deal, Drooga.
It's too late to back out.
No! I made an offer. And now I take back that offer.
I'm sure someone else will want this rare specimen.
I'll find another buyer.
But another buyer won't have that starship engine you desire.
I still expect to be paid, you tub of grease.
You owe me.
I don't pay for things I don't want.
I only wanted your male shanjaru to complete a set. But thieves stole my female shanjaru!
If I can't have a complete set, I don't want that male you brought. Go away!
Give me another chance, pal.
If you seek friendship, go to the Red Light Sector.
Let's negotiate.
No deals! The eighteenth course is about to be served!
I'll go--after I bury my blaster in your flabby head.
You want to die?
Ha! It takes more than blasters to kill a Hutt!
If you have more words, say them to my servant Ga'ram. Maybe he'll take pity and throw you some scraps.
I didn't invite you to my feast. Be entertaining, and I'll let you stay.
Hah! Not even deadly Kaleesh warriors can stand against the mighty Bowdaar! The Wookiee is truly a force of nature!
But have no fear, my guests. This Wookiee belongs to your humble host Drooga! Isn't my new pet entertaining?
You put on quite a show, Drooga.
Impressive.
I live for the spectacle of blood! The smell of death and desperation whets my appetite like nothing else in the galaxy.
That was all staged?
The eighteenth course is about to be served. Blood chowder with a loop pastry crust. Seeing blood spilled always makes me hungry!
That Wookiee doesn't look so tough to me.
He's just a dumb animal.
He's been pit fighting since he was a pup. I must find tougher opponents for him.
